create-descriptor start=a end=z replicas=(1,2,3)
----
created descriptor: r1:{a-z} [(n1,s1):1, (n2,s2):2, (n3,s3):3, next=4, gen=0]

create-replica range-id=1 initialized
----

destroy-replica range-id=1
----
